name: Marshall HALE, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Hale v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Marshall HALE, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of April, 2009, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
968 A.2d 764
Marshall HALE, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
